name: search
description: Get real-time organic search results from across the web with support for Google Search parameters (gl, hl, tbs, etc) and city level geo targeting. Supports all Google Advanced Search operators such (e.g. inurl:, site:, intitle:, etc).

num.description: Maximum number of results to return.
num.title: Num

start.description: Number of results to skip (for pagination).
start.title: Start

gl.description: The country / region for which to make the query.
gl.title: Gl

hl.description: The language to use for the search (Google's hl parameter).
hl.title: Hl

tbs.description: This parameter defines advanced search parameters that aren't available using regular query parameters (to be searched).
tbs.title: Tbs

location.description: Where you want the search to originate from. It is recommended to specify location at the city level in order to simulate a real userâ€™s search (e.g. London, England, United Kingdom).
location.title: Location

nfpr.description: Exclude results of auto-corrected query when the original query is misspelled with nfpr=1 and include them with nfpr=0 (default).
nfpr.title: Nfpr

name: batch_search
description: Lightning fast endpoint for getting organic search results from across the web in real-time with support for up to 100 queries in a single request. Supports all Google Advanced Search operators such (e.g. inurl:, site:, intitle:, etc).
